events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords found in the resume including software development, cloud infrastructure, and DevOps.
A recruiter with technical background was assigned to manage this candidate's process to ensure proper screening and coordination for interviews.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong understanding of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
Candidate responded promptly and showed enthusiasm about the opportunity and schedule proposed for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the engineering panel to assess coding and system design skills.
